Today I am self-encouraged to write more, which primarily influenced by the following reason:

  1. My blog site has just been finished and published, and since it’s a more-than-a-half-year project, with online CMS services(so I can blog anywhere). It will be such a shame if I don’t fulfill some of its purposes.
  2. I started reusing Grammarly for grammar checking service recently.
  3. I practiced over months for typing, which would be another shame not used by writing.
  4. Those three reasons’ grammar has already annoyed me enough.
